description:
While hiding from a group of television interviewers, Suzuna questions why Sena doesn`t tell Mamori who he is. This leads to a quick review of the previous 38 episodes. Sena tells Suzuna that he will tell Mamori his identity when he defeats his ultimate rival, Shin Seijuuro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En route pour le Christmas Bowl
La strada per il Christmas Bowl
The Road to the Christmas Bowl!
クリスマスボウルへの道
